description: [Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) involved the development of a new web shell variant, [VersaMem](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1154).(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
